channel.title: Emotes to specials?
channel.description: Ok So I added SWAT's new emote system and I added a new emote and gfx, but I dont know how to apply the emote and gfx to the weapon special. Does anyone know how?

item.title: Emotes to specials?
item.dc:creator: @Zukyak Zukyak
item.description:
@Zukyak wrote:

[quote=“LKCTheReturn, post:2, topic:326642”]Search client.java for the old gfx or emote and just update the ones that are defined, with the ones from SWAT’s new emote system…
I am not sure of the gfx or emotes of the specials.[/quote]

Ok thanks. I’ll see where this leads me

Read full topic
